subject: Football (College)
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Rollie Stichweh is going to be inducted into the Army Sports Hall of Fame, and his friends and former opponents from Navy, Roger Staubach and Ed Orr, will be there.
snippet: Rollie Stichweh is going to be inducted into the Army Sports Hall of Fame, and his friends and former opponents from Navy, Roger Staubach and Ed Orr, will be there.
